1. 1-2 or more yearsâ€™ experience in the above-described areas of datacenter services and infrastructure, with sufficient knowledge to communicate credibly to practitioners, vendors and investors in these markets.
2. To be considered for interview, applicants will be required to provide examples of their writing appropriate to the S&P TMT audience. It is strongly recommended that applicants familiarize themselves with 451 Research and its output, beginning with our site at https://www.spglobal.com/marketintelligence/en/solutions/451-research.
3. Experience in any of the following may be considered: Product management, product marketing, or practitioner experience in implementation.
4. Vertical market or associated technology area research role with an industry analyst firm
5. Market intelligence, competitive intelligence, strategy or business development role with a datacenter services vendor
